Package edu.spa.ftclib.internal.controller

General control classes interfaces, PID-type controllers, and a "finishing algorithm"

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Controller
    Outputs a value for the robot to use to control some component of the robot
    DerivativeAlgorithm
    A controller algorithm, where the derivative aspect of the controller is provided by the robot, instead of the program calculating it itself.
    Finishable
    Used for all controllers that reach a value and then stop and are considered finished.
    Targetable
    Created by Gabriel on 2018-01-02.
    TargetableAlgorithm
    Created by Gabriel on 2018-01-02.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ControlAlgorithm
    An algorithm you import a target value into, and then the robot using a variety of mathematical techniques determines an output value, which is used to control the robot and keep it as close to the target value as possible.
    ErrorTimeThresholdFinishingAlgorithm
    Uses error tolerance and time threshold to determine when to stop running the controller and count it as "finished." The robot must stay within the error tolerance continuously for the time given in the time threshold to finish.
    FinishableIntegratedController  
    FinishingAlgorithm
    Any algorithm that has a target it is trying to reach and will then count as finished.
    IntegratedController  
    PController
    Created by Gabriel on 2017-12-28.
    PIController
    Created by Gabriel on 2017-12-28.
    PIDController
    Created by Gabriel on 2/25/2017; edited substantially on 2017-12-28.
